action.title: 核心组件测试
action.desc: 测试toolkit目录中核心组件是否生效
action.set: echo '-------------' echo '当前busybox版本：' busybox | grep BusyBox echo '' echo '-------------' echo '当前运行目录：' pwd echo '-------------' echo "service.sh状态 :" $TOOLKIT/service.sh about echo '-------------' echo "proot状态 :" $TOOLKIT/proot --help echo '-------------' echo "chroot状态 :" $TOOLKIT/busybox chroot echo "debootstrap 状态 :" sh $TOOLS/debootstrap
